response.original_title: Linda Barker Solutions: Sitting and Dining Room & Bedroom
response.overview: Got the inclination but lack the expertise? Simple!  Take top TV Designer Linda Barker and her team of experts, add a dose of practical common sense and you'll get Solutions; a range of DVDS offering an affordable and straightforward answer to all your DIY challenges  Each DVD contains a range of projects with easy to follow hints and tips.  With basic decorating techniques and ideas for the Kitchen, Bathroom, bedroom and Garden, Solutions is the complete step-by step guide to home improvements.
response.title: Linda Barker Solutions: Sitting and Dining Room & Bedroom
